name: Amy Montoya
text: Guess this is why they have a 5. 99 carry out deal... in the end you end up paying Close to nine dollars! How are you gonna forget to cut the pizza bro?

name: Christopher Lund
text: Love this Mr. Gatti's and is actually the only time I have ever visited one of their stores. I use carryout every time I order and never have I had to wait especially around lunchtime which is when I order from them the most. Customer …More

name: Amanda Simopoulos
text: Daniel is a rockstar!!! Another gatti's seriously messed up my pizza. I called this one and they made it right for me and it was PERFECT!!!! y'all are so awesome, thank you! ☺️

name: CROSSWALD
text: Gotta update my old 5 star review. This place use to be great. But the last 3 times ive ordered, the pizza came just raw as can be. They are still good at being on time but on top of it being raw, 2 were folded over. I just wanted thin crust pepperoni and not reverse tacos.

name: Yvette Quintanilla
text: I love Mr Gatti's pizza, it's my favorite. I work near Bee Cave and 360 and there aren't many choices around there. The office usually orders Domino's (yuck!) so I changed it up and ordered Gatti's a couple of times for the whole office, …More

name: Tyler Prince
text: Everytime I call this location the staff is extremely rude! I even hung up on the guy a few months ago and tonight was no different! The woman that answered was less than friendly. She didnt offer any options or specials and sounded as though she was being inconveniencing! On top of that once it got here my order was wrong.

name: Kaitlyn Monroe
text: Great pizza, the guy working there wasnt the friendliest guy in the world, but it looked like he was there by himself so i didnt mind.  Pizza was made very fast and tasted great, will return!

name: Brandon Bell
text: Great service, pizza was hot, fresh and tasty, made perfectly. Aaron the manager was beyond friendly. I'll definitely be going back there.

name: ashley floyd
text: The guy that answers the phone is AWFUL! I have no idea how he still has a job bc he couldn’t be more rude. Don’t think about asking a question or taking a one second pause to think bc he will just slap you on hold. Please get rid of this jerk.

name: Cassy Nicole
text: Best ever, been eating it since I was a kid. Good combos and prices.

name: Jimmy Texas
text: I've always loved Gattis, but most of the people who answer the phone at this location have a terrible attitude.

name: Kal Stoykov
text: Ordered for a football night. Great taste and fast delivery. Will order again.

name: Jennifer Slasor
text: I called to order pizzas for our work.  The guy that answered the phone was extremely annoyed that I had questions even going so far as sighing loudly into the phone and then placing me on hold so I could figure it out on my own.  I …More

name: max MAchicek
text: Awful customer service. Twice I've placed an order for pickup, waited twenty minutes even though the employee said it'd be ready in ten, to arrive and find my order hadn't even been started. …More

name: mrlee
text: We called 4 times then on the 5th time they finally answered we were put on hold for 10 mins. THEN IT TOOK THEM an hour and a half. I don't recommend!!!!!

name: Mark Rosenau
text: walk-in pick up is quick and easy

name: Carter Young
text: This was the first place i had ever had pizza when i was younger. i was amazed by the taste and this place creates memories!

name: Christopher Bodywork
text: I think Pizza Hut might have passed them up in quality
